text:
Now that football at every level has wrapped up, it's time for the 2016 All-ArizonaVarsity Awards to be revealed.
The schedule for the awards release is below.
2/8: 6A
2/9: 5A
2/10: 4A
2/11: 3A
2/12: 2A
2/19: The ArizonaVarsity Fantasy Draft- the staff pick their best 25, and Twitter votes on the best squad.
TJ Green (Chandler) Carlos Salcedo 6A ArizonaVarsity MVP TJ Green- Chandler
6A ArizonaVarsity Offensive Player of the Year Brock Purdy- Perry
6A ArizonaVarsity Defensive Player of the Year Isaiah Pola-Mao- Mountain Pointe
6A ArizonaVarsity Two-Way Player of the Year Jalen Harris- Desert Ridge
6A ArizonaVarsity Breakout Player of the Year Gabriel Claudio- Cibola
6A ArizonaVarsity Underclassmen of the Year Jacob Conover- Chandler
6A All-ArizonaVarsity First Team QB- Jacob Conover- Chandler
